date-modified: last-modified

---

Download the required OTF fonts files, e.g., [source-han-serif](https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-han-serif/tree/release/OTF/SimplifiedChinese). Then simply move `.otf` files to `~/Library/Fonts` folder. In `Font Book` application, now one can see the fonts in `My Fonts`.
